mapper.select: SELECT EVL_OG_TP_CD , EVL_DV_CD , EVL_DV_NM , EVL_ATC_DV_CD , LOWER(EVL_ATC_DV_CD) AS L_EVL_ATC_DV_CD , EVL_ATC_DV_NM , DV_CD , NUM , NVL(CEXP_CN, '') AS CEXP_CN , NVL(CALF_CN, '') AS CALF_CN , LOWER(EVL_ATC_DV_CD)|| CASE WHEN DV_CD = 1 AND NUM = 1 THEN 'Score' WHEN DV_CD = 3 AND NUM = 1 THEN 'Trg' WHEN DV_CD = 3 AND NUM = 2 THEN 'Score' WHEN DV_CD = 3 AND NUM = 3 THEN 'Rate' END AS FIELD_NAME , CASE WHEN DV_CD = 1 AND NUM = 1 THEN EVL_ATC_DV_NM WHEN DV_CD = 3 AND NUM = 1 THEN '목표' WHEN DV_CD = 3 AND NUM = 2 THEN '점수' WHEN DV_CD = 3 AND NUM = 3 THEN '달성률' END AS COL_HEADER , CASE WHEN DV_CD = 1 AND NUM = 1 THEN 'score' WHEN DV_CD = 3 AND NUM = 1 THEN 'trg' WHEN DV_CD = 3 AND NUM = 2 THEN 'score' WHEN DV_CD = 3 AND NUM = 3 THEN 'rate' END AS DATA_TYPE FROM ( SELECT T2.EVL_OG_TP_CD , T2.EVL_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'EVL_DV_CD', T2.EVL_DV_CD) AS EVL_DV_NM , T2.EVL_ATC_DV_CD /* 평가항목구분코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'EVL_ATC_DV_CD', T2.EVL_ATC_DV_CD) AS EVL_ATC_DV_NM , T3.TRG_USE_YN , T3.CALF_CN , T3.CEXP_CN , CASE WHEN TRG_USE_YN = 'Y' THEN '3' ELSE '1' END AS DV_CD , T2.SORT_ODR FROM TB_PSEV_AWD_EVL_BASE_BAS T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT BASE_YM , EVL_OG_TP_CD , EVL_DV_CD , EVL_ATC_DV_CD , EVL_PD_DV_CD , EVL_BASE_UNIT_N , CVT_BASE_PC , TRG_BASE_PC , SORT_ODR FROM TB_PSEV_AWD_EVL_BASE_DTL WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY BASE_YM , EVL_OG_TP_CD , EVL_DV_CD , EVL_ATC_DV_CD , EVL_PD_DV_CD , EVL_BASE_UNIT_N , CVT_BASE_PC , TRG_BASE_PC , SORT_ODR ) T2 ON T2.EVL_DV_CD = T1.EVL_DV_CD AND T2.EVL_OG_TP_CD = T1.EVL_OG_TP_CD AND T2.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM INNER JOIN TB_PSEV_AWD_EVL_ATC_BASE_BAS T3 ON T3.EVL_OG_TP_CD = T2.EVL_OG_TP_CD AND T3.EVL_ATC_DV_CD = T2.EVL_ATC_DV_CD WHERE T1.EVL_DV_CD = #{evlDvCd} AND T1.EVL_OG_TP_CD = #{evlOgTpCd} AND T1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} ) T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT LEVEL NUM FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 3) T2 ON T2.NUM BETWEEN 1 AND T1.DV_CD ORDER BY T1.SORT_ODR, T2.NUM ASC

SELECT EVL_OG_TP_CD , EVL_RSB_DV_CD , RGST_SN , QLF_DV_CD , EVL_RSB_REL_ID , CALF_CN , CEXP_CN FROM TB_PSEV_AWD_EVL_RSB_REL WHERE EVL_RSB_REL_ID = (#{evlOgTpCd}||#{evlDvCd}||LPAD('1', 5, '0')) AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND CALF_CN IS NOT NULL

SELECT EVL_OG_TP_CD , EVL_RSB_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'EVL_RSB_DV_CD', EVL_RSB_DV_CD) AS EVL_RSB_DV_NM FROM TB_PSEV_AWD_EVL_RSB_REL WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND EVL_OG_TP_CD = #{evlOgTpCd} AND EVL_RSB_REL_ID = (#{evlOgTpCd}||#{evlDvCd}||LPAD('1', 5, '0'))
